title: (Thurs Full) Eddie Says It’s Okay to Send back Food if It “Doesn’t Hit the Spot” + Major Development in the Haunted Doll
itunes:title: (Thurs Full) Eddie Says It’s Okay to Send back Food if It “Doesn’t Hit the Spot” + Major Development in the Haunted Doll
description:
Eddie reveals that he is teaching his son that it’s okay to send food back merely because it didn’t ‘hit the spot’. He let his son ask for another milkshake after the one he ordered wasn’t up to his liking. We get a major development in the haunted doll homework assignment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
